#SLOPE[TYPE=STEP]
#SCALE X0.5 Y0.5
#SCALE ON
$FOR P1=0, 3, 1
M180=9900
M181=100
G0 F50000
G1 F1000
; G-Code generated by Inkscape
G21 ; Set units to mm
G90 ; Use absolute coordinates
G0 X0.000000 Y0.000000 ; Move to start position
M150
G1 X10.000000 Y0.000000 F200 ; Cut a line
G1 X10.000000 Y10.000000 ; Cut a line
G1 X0.000000 Y10.000000 ; Cut a line
G1 X0.000000 Y0.000000 ; Cut a line
M151
G0 X0.000000 Y0.000000 ; Move to home position
M2 ; End of program
G0 X0.00 Y0.00
$ENDFOR
#SCALE OFF
M30
